roleset.name: forbid, prohibit

role.descr: entity prohibited from enacting/participating in arg1

example.name: arg1
example.text: Mr. Thornburgh will be free to disband the strike forces after Congress approves a $ 479 million appropriation for federal law - enforcement and drug - interdiction agencies , according to David Runkel , a Justice Department spokesman .

roleset.note: Fleshed out by Julia based on on499-nouns-be.
